>
[Virga May](/Feats.aspx?ID=2334) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Changeling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=212" />
<trait label="Lineage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=317" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 22 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Born of a storm hag, you have one crystal-blue or rain-gray eye. You share your mother's power over wind and storm. You can cast [_electric arc_](/Spells.aspx?ID=97) as an occult innate cantrip. As normal, a cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.

<title level="2">Virga May leads to...</title>
[Favorable Winds](/Feats.aspx?ID=2336), [Invoke the Elements](/Feats.aspx?ID=2337)
name: Virga May
